channel.title: World of battle - by Georgio & Jack!
channel.description:
[B]Programmers; Georgio & Jack Base; RiotScape[/B] NIO Networking + holds 2K players!
[img]http://world-of-battle.com/smf/Themes/greenfox/images/logo.png[/img]
Welcome,
so im going to show/tell you some information about the server :)
The server wil be mostly pking based and we are trying to have all skills, we like pkers and skillers so skilling must come. We wil also try updating it verry much! We have a stable economy so no dupes and the base is not DELTASCAPE! The server is base is RiotScape(emulous). It is easy to train because its like 1.2k(1200XP) Per hit so 1 hit wil be like 10 in a Combat skill, but its pretty hard to get items and such! We hope you wil enjoy the server please read/watch the following;
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Client can be downloaded here; Ehm at forums but i cannot advertise well pme if you want to or check serverstatus or my SIG! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PlayerKilling [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2efu9hl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2efu9hl.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mR9oXXRPfCc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mR9oXXRPfCc[/url] - VID! MORE COMING SOON!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Skilling [img width=300 height=325]http://i34.tinypic.com/207rgqs.jpg[/img] [img width=496 height=325]http://i34.tinypic.com/29m88dc.jpg[/img] MORE COMING SOON!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Other [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/im16qq.gif[/img] [img width=239 height=325]http://i33.tinypic.com/2jfjg2u.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4346/69639600.png[/img] MORE COMING SOON!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UPDATES; [B]- Shops interfaces closes when running away - FIXED - Custom crowns added(Owner, Head Admin, Admin, Mod, Donator) - ADDED - Admins cannot duel - ADDED - Admins keeps items when dying - ADDED - Admins cannot get attacked or attack! - ADDED - mage timers - ADDED - mage hit delays - ADDED - slayer - ADDED - theiving - ADDED - rushing - FIXED - fighter torso - FIXED - duel bug - FIXED - Login bug - FIXED - run to follow bug - FIXED - Combat bug - FIXED - Barrows, made new one - ADDED - piety - ADDED - chivalry - ADDED[/COLOR][/B] [b]MORE COMING SOON[/b]
[QUOTE=Support;102163] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/14lppwz.png[/img] [code][URL=http://www.google.org/forumdisplay.php?f=665/][*IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/14lppwz.png[/*IMG][/*URL] WITHOUT THE [b]*[/b][/code][/QUOTE]
VPS Upload & Download; [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/601343592.png[/img]
Thank you!

item.title: World of battle - by Georgio & Jack!
item.dc:creator: @I_Voidz_I I Voidz I
item.description:
@I_Voidz_I wrote:

[quote=“Mr G, post:3, topic:311190”][quote author=moh link=topic=407633.msg3010460#msg3010460 date=1256738139]
Nothing, speciala emu already had dueling so you need to come with something new try to add pc to it.
[/quote]

roflmao emulous could never hold 2048 players

  • mine has NIO Networking etc…[/quote]

Which was all done by Lmctruck so HIS has Networking not yours…

Read full topic
